description:
On first launch it opens the AllTray GUI and allows you to minimize a window, however that window does not appear in the system tray, instead it is hidden completely and has to be ended in system monitor before it can be reopened. 

Launching AllTray from activities will open the AllTray GUI, however it is completely inoperable, and has to be force closed to get rid of it
summary: Doesn't work on Ubuntu 18.04.3 LTS / Gnome 3.28.4

description: As per internet wanted to use for startup thunderbird at sys start. Does not do. Other use I have not tested.
Not functional, flagging to be removed from discover until a fix can be done
Ne fonctionne pas, problème même pour supprimer. Aucun intérêt.
